parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query: Resources | where type =~ "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces" | order by name | project id, name, selected=row_number()==1, group=resourceGroup
parameters.label: üóÇÔ∏è Workspace

content.json:
## Jamf Protect for Microsoft Sentinel!

The [Jamf Protect](https://www.jamf.com/solutions/threat-prevention-remediation/) for Microsoft Sentinel solution creates detailed event data from macOS endpoints into a Microsoft Sentinel workspace in a simple and easy workflow. The solution provides you with full visibility into Apple Endpoint Security by leveraging Workbooks containing [Alert](https://docs.jamf.com/jamf-protect/documentation/Alerts.html) and [Unified Logging](https://docs.jamf.com/jamf-protect/documentation/Unified_Logging.html) events captured by Jamf Protect and the [macOS built-in security events](https://support.apple.com/en-gb/guide/security/sec469d47bd8/web) that occurred across the protected organisational endpoints


#### Changelog

**v2.1**

***Workbook***
 - Added Endpoint Telemetry
    - Includes graphs and visualisations
	- Includes Endpoint Information
	- Includes Jamf Pro log parser
- Added Network Threat Events
 	- Includes graphs and visualisations
- Added new Pickers
    - Allows selecting different Log Analytic Workspaces
    - Changed TimeRanger picker
- Added Changelog

**Analytic Rules**

- Added Analytic Rules
	- Jamf Protect - Alerts
	- Jamf Protect - Unified Logs
	- Jamf Protect - Network Threat Events


 **v2.0**
 
- Initial release of the solution containing a basic Workbook
Set an type and provide values to search on File hash, CVE numbers or report on Alerts mapped to the MITRE framework or display latest alerts for a single endpoint.

parameters.name: _type
parameters.label: Type

parameters.name: _hostnamealert
parameters.label: Hostname
parameters.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_host_hostname_s != ""
| project-keep input_host_hostname_s
| project-rename Hostname = input_host_hostname_s
| summarize by Hostname

parameters.name: _filehash
parameters.label: File Hash
parameters.description: Thish value can be used for searching all alerts for a certain hash

parameters.name: _CVE
parameters.label: CVE Number
parameters.description: Please search on the CVE number

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s == "GPThreatMatchExecEvent"
| where input_related_binaries_s contains "{_filehash:value}"
| extend Severity = case(input_match_severity_d == 0, "Informational", input_match_severity_d == 1, "Low", input_match_severity_d == 2, "Medium", input_match_severity_d == 3, "High", "True")
| extend AlertURL = strcat("https://", org_hd_s, ".jamfcloud.com/Alerts/", input_match_uuid_g)
| project-keep
    TimeGenerated,
    input_match_event_matchValue_s,
    Severity,
    input_match_event_matchType_s,
    input_match_event_process_args_s,
    input_host_hostname_s,
    AlertURL
| project-rename
    Related_To = input_match_event_matchValue_s,
    EventType = input_match_event_matchType_s,
    Alert_Severity = Severity,
    Process_Arguments = input_match_event_process_args_s,
    Hostname = input_host_hostname_s
| project-reorder
    TimeGenerated,
    Alert_Severity,
    EventType,
    Related_To,
    Process_Arguments,
    Alert_Severity,
    Hostname,
    AlertURL
| sort by TimeGenerated
content.title: Matches on FileHash
content.noDataMessage: No matches found based on the hash value

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where parse_json(input_match_tags_s) contains "{_CVE:value}"
| extend Severity = case(input_match_severity_d == 0, "Informational", input_match_severity_d == 1, "Low", input_match_severity_d == 2, "Medium", input_match_severity_d == 3, "High", "True")
| project-keep
    TimeGenerated,
    input_match_event_matchValue_s,
    input_match_tags_s,
    Severity,
    input_match_event_matchType_s,
    input_match_event_process_args_s,
    input_host_hostname_s
| project-rename
    Related_To = input_match_event_matchValue_s,
    CVE = input_match_tags_s,
    EventType = input_match_event_matchType_s,
    Alert_Severity = Severity,
    Process_Arguments = input_match_event_process_args_s,
    Hostname = input_host_hostname_s
| sort by TimeGenerated
content.title: Matches on CVE
content.noDataMessage: No matches found based on the _CVE:value CVE number

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where parse_json(input_match_tags_s) contains "MITREattack"
| extend Severity = case(input_match_severity_d == 0, "Informational", input_match_severity_d == 1, "Low", input_match_severity_d == 2, "Medium", input_match_severity_d == 3, "High", "True")
| extend AlertURL = strcat("https://", org_hd_s, ".jamfcloud.com/Alerts/", input_match_uuid_g)
| extend Analytic = parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[0].name
| extend Description = parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[0].human
| project-keep
    TimeGenerated,
    input_eventType_s,
    Analytic,
    Description,
    input_match_tags_s,
    Severity,
    input_host_hostname_s,
    AlertURL
| project-rename
    EventType = input_eventType_s,
    TAGS = input_match_tags_s,
    Alert_Severity = Severity,
    Hostname = input_host_hostname_s
| project-reorder
    TimeGenerated,
    EventType,
    Analytic,
    Description,
    TAGS,
    Alert_Severity,
    Hostname,
    AlertURL
| sort by TimeGenerated
content.title: Alerts mapped to MITRE
content.noDataMessage: No alerts found that are mapped to the MITRE framework

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_host_hostname_s contains "{_hostnamealert:value}"
| where topicType_s == "alert" and input_eventType_s <> ""
| extend Severity = case(input_match_severity_d == 0, "Informational", input_match_severity_d == 1, "Low", input_match_severity_d == 2, "Medium", input_match_severity_d == 3, "High", "True")
| extend AlertURL = strcat("https://", org_hd_s, ".jamfcloud.com/Alerts/", input_match_uuid_g)
| extend Analytic = parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[0].name
| extend Description = parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[0].human
| project-keep
    TimeGenerated,
    input_eventType_s,
    Analytic,
    Description,
    input_match_tags_s,
    Severity,
    input_host_hostname_s,
    AlertURL
| project-rename
    EventType = input_eventType_s,
    TAGS = input_match_tags_s,
    Alert_Severity = Severity,
    Hostname = input_host_hostname_s
| project-reorder
    TimeGenerated,
    EventType,
    Analytic,
    Description,
    TAGS,
    Alert_Severity,
    Hostname,
    AlertURL
| sort by TimeGenerated
| limit 10
content.title: Recent 10 alerts in the past {_timetoken:value} for {_hostnamealert:value}

items.name: Query - Threat Hunting 10 Recent Alerts Endpoint

content.query:
datatable (Count: long, severity: string) [
    0, "Informational",
    0, "Low",
    0, "Medium",
    0, "High"
]
| union
    (
    jamfprotect_CL
    | where topicType_s == "alert" and input_eventType_s <> ""
    | extend severity = case(input_match_severity_d == 0, "Informational", input_match_severity_d == 1, "Low", input_match_severity_d == 2, "Medium", input_match_severity_d == 3, "High", "True")
    | where severity != "True"
    | summarize Count = count() by severity
    )
| where isnotempty(severity)
| summarize Count=sum(Count) by severity
content.title: All Alerts {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where topicType_s == "alert"
    and input_eventType_s <> ""
| extend severity = case(input_match_severity_d == 0, "Informational", input_match_severity_d == 1, "Low", input_match_severity_d == 2, "Medium", input_match_severity_d == 3, "High", "True")
| where severity != "True"
| summarize count() by severity, bin(TimeGenerated,{_timetoken:grain})
| render areachart
content.title: Events Detected (Count By Severity) {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL

| where input_eventType_s == "GPUnifiedLogEvent"
| extend name_ = tostring(parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[0].name)
| where isnotempty(name_)
| summarize count() by name_, bin(TimeGenerated,{_timetoken:grain})
| render areachart
content.title: Unified Logging Events {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where topicType_s == "alert" and input_eventType_s <> "" and input_host_hostname_s <> ""
| summarize Event = count() by input_host_hostname_s
| project-rename HostName = input_host_hostname_s
| sort by Event desc
content.title: Most Active Endpoints (Total, last {_timetoken:value})

items.name: Query - Most active endpoints with Alerts

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where topicType_s == "alert" and input_eventType_s <> ""
| summarize Events = count() by Type, bin(TimeGenerated,{_timetoken:grain})
| render columnchart
content.title: Events detected (Total by date, {_timetoken:value})

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s <> ""
| summarize Events = count() by input_eventType_s, bin(TimeGenerated,{_timetoken:grain})
| render areachart with(kind=stacked)
content.title: Events Detected (Count by Type, {_timetoken:value})

items.name: Query - Events detected counted by Type

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s <> ""
| summarize Events = count() by input_eventType_s
| render piechart
content.title: Event Types {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s == "GPFSEvent"
| extend name_ = tostring(parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[0].name)
| summarize count() by name_
| render piechart
content.title: File System Event Types {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s == "GPProcessEvent"
| extend name_ = tostring(parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[0].name)
| summarize count() by name_
| render piechart
content.title: Process Event Types {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s == "GPUSBEvent"
or input_eventType_s == "GPFSEvent" and tostring(parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[0].name) == "USBWrite"
| extend name_ = tostring(parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[0].name)
| summarize count() by name_
| render piechart
content.title: USB Event Types {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s == "GPGatekeeperEvent"
| extend name_ = tostring(parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[0].name)
| summarize count() by name_
| render piechart
content.title: Gatekeeper Event Types {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s == "GPThreatMatchExecEvent"
| summarize Threat = count() by input_match_event_matchValue_s
| render piechart
content.title: Threat Prevention Types {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s <> ""
| extend name_ = tostring(parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[0].name)
| summarize count() by input_eventType_s, name_
| project-rename EventType = input_eventType_s, Event = name_, Count = count_
| sort by Count desc
| limit 10
content.title: Top 10 Event Types {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s == "GPPreventedExecutionEvent"
| where input_host_hostname_s <> ""
| extend SigningID = parse_json(input_match_event_process_signingInfo_s).teamid
| extend BundleID = parse_json(input_match_event_process_signingInfo_s).appid
| project-keep input_match_event_process_name_s, SigningID, BundleID
| project-rename Process = input_match_event_process_name_s
| summarize Count= count() by Process, tostring(BundleID), tostring(SigningID)
| sort by Count asc nulls first
| limit 25
content.title: Process Blocked by Custom Prevent List {_timetoken:value}

items.name: Query - Process Blocked by Custom Prevent List

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s == "GPGatekeeperEvent"
| extend name_ = tostring(parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[0].name)
| summarize count() by name_, input_match_event_path_s
| project-rename BlockType = name_, Executable = input_match_event_path_s, Count = count_
| sort by Count desc
| limit 10
content.title: Top Gatekeeper Blocked Items {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s == "GPUnifiedLogEvent"
| where input_match_event_subsystem_s == "com.apple.XProtectFramework.PluginAPI"
| where tostring(parse_json(input_match_event_composedMessage_s).status_message) <> "[]"
| extend status_message_ = tostring(parse_json(input_match_event_composedMessage_s).status_message)
| extend execution_duration_ = tostring(parse_json(input_match_event_composedMessage_s).execution_duration)
| project 
    Time=TimeGenerated, 
    Hostname=input_host_hostname_s, 
    Status=status_message_, 
    Module=input_match_event_process_s, 
    Execution_Duration=execution_duration_
| sort by Time desc
| limit 25
content.title: XProtect Remediator Scans {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s == "auth-mount"
| extend name_ = tostring(parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[1].name)
| where name_ == "EnforcedRemovableDevicePolicy"
| extend name_ = replace("EnforcedRemovableDevicePolicy", "Blocked", name_)
| summarize count() by name_
content.title: Device Controls Blocked {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_eventType_s == "auth-mount"
| extend name_ = tostring(parse_json(input_match_facts_s)[1].name)
| where name_ == "EnforcedRemovableDevicePolicy"
| extend device_ = strcat(input_match_event_device_vendorName_s, " ",input_match_event_device_productName_s)
| summarize count() by input_host_hostname_s, device_
| project-rename Hostname = input_host_hostname_s, Device = device_, Count = count_
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Device Controls Endpoint {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where identity_signer_id_s == "com.apple.sudo"
    and exec_chain_child_parent_path_s == "/usr/bin/sudo"
    and subject_effective_user_name_s == "root"
    and subject_audit_user_name_s != "-1"
| extend binary=parse_json(path_s)[0]
| extend Compiled_Arguments = strcat(binary, " ", exec_args_args_2_s, " ", exec_args_args_3_s)
| project-keep
    TimeGenerated,
    host_info_host_name_s,
    subject_audit_user_name_s,
    Compiled_Arguments
| project-rename Hostname = host_info_host_name_s, Elevated_User = subject_audit_user_name_s
| limit 10
| sort by TimeGenerated
content.title: Succesful sudo events {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
//| where subject_terminal_id_ip_address_s != "0.0.0.0" and header_event_name_s != "AUE_SESSION_START" and header_event_name_s != "PLAINTEXT_LOG_COLLECTION_EVENT" and header_event_name_s != "BIOS_FIRMWARE_VERSIONS" and header_event_name_s != "SYSTEM_PERFORMANCE_METRICS" and header_event_name_s != "RATE_LIMITING_APPLIED"
| where subject_terminal_id_ip_address_s != "0.0.0.0" and header_event_name_s == "AUE_EXECVE"
    or subject_terminal_id_ip_address_s != "0.0.0.0" and header_event_name_s == "AUE_logout"
    or subject_terminal_id_ip_address_s != "0.0.0.0" and header_event_name_s == "AUE_SESSION_CLOSE"
    or subject_terminal_id_ip_address_s != "0.0.0.0" and header_event_name_s == "AUE_openssh"
| where isnotempty(host_info_host_name_s)
| where isnotempty(header_event_name_s)
| where topicType_s != "alert"
| extend binary=parse_json(path_s)[0]
| extend Compiled_Arguments = strcat(binary, " ", exec_args_args_2_s, " ", exec_args_args_3_s, " ", exec_args_args_4_s)
| project-keep
    TimeGenerated,
    header_event_name_s,
    return_description_s,
    host_info_host_name_s,
    subject_terminal_id_ip_address_s,
    subject_audit_user_name_s,
    subject_process_name_s,
    Compiled_Arguments
| project-rename
    EventName = header_event_name_s,
    Description = return_description_s,
    Hostname = host_info_host_name_s,
    Process_Name = subject_process_name_s,
    IP_Adress = subject_terminal_id_ip_address_s,
    Elevated_User = subject_audit_user_name_s
| limit 15
| sort by TimeGenerated
content.title: Remotely Controlled Commands (Outbound) {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL 
| where isnotnull(host_info_host_name_s)
| where isnotnull(subject_process_name_s)
| project-keep TimeGenerated, exec_chain_child_parent_path_s, subject_process_name_s
| project-rename
    Process = exec_chain_child_parent_path_s,
    Parent_Process = subject_process_name_s
| summarize Rare_Process_Count = count() by Parent_Process, Process
| sort by Rare_Process_Count asc nulls first
| limit 100
content.title: Rare Process Executions (All Executions) {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where host_info_host_name_s != "" and exec_chain_child_parent_path_s != ""
| project
    host_info_host_name_s,
    subject_process_name_s,
    exec_chain_child_parent_path_s,
    exec_chain_thread_uuid_g
| summarize
    thread_uuid = make_set(exec_chain_thread_uuid_g, 128),
    host = make_set(host_info_host_name_s, 128),
    process= make_set(subject_process_name_s, 128)
    by exec_chain_child_parent_path_s
| project 
    host, 
    process, 
    parent_process=exec_chain_child_parent_path_s, 
    thread_uuid
content.title: Parent/child process with thread uuid {_timetoken:value}

items.name: Query - Parent and Child Process UUID

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where header_event_name_s == "BIOS_FIRMWARE_VERSIONS" and isnotempty(bios_firmware_versions_release_date_s)
| project bios_firmware_versions_release_date_s, host_info_host_name_s
| project-rename Firmware_release_date = bios_firmware_versions_release_date_s, Hostname = host_info_host_name_s
| summarize arg_max(Firmware_release_date, *) by Hostname
| summarize Count=count() by Firmware_release_date
| render piechart by Count
content.title: Intel clients on firmware releases by date {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where header_event_name_s == "BIOS_FIRMWARE_VERSIONS" and isnotempty(bios_firmware_versions_version_s)
| project bios_firmware_versions_version_s, host_info_host_name_s
| project-rename Firmware_Version = bios_firmware_versions_version_s, Hostname = host_info_host_name_s
| summarize arg_max(Firmware_Version, *) by Hostname
| summarize Count=count() by Firmware_Version
| render piechart by Count
content.title: Intel clients firmware versions {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where header_event_name_s == "BIOS_FIRMWARE_VERSIONS" and isnotempty(bios_firmware_versions_system_firmware_version_s)
| project bios_firmware_versions_system_firmware_version_s, host_info_host_name_s
| project-rename Firmware_Version = bios_firmware_versions_system_firmware_version_s, Hostname = host_info_host_name_s
| summarize arg_max(Firmware_Version, *) by Hostname
| summarize Count=count() by Firmware_Version
| render piechart by Count
content.title: Silicon clients firmware versions {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where header_event_name_s == "BIOS_FIRMWARE_VERSIONS"
| project architecture_s, host_info_host_name_s
| project-rename Architectures = architecture_s, Hostname = host_info_host_name_s
| summarize arg_max(Architectures, *) by Hostname
| summarize Count=count() by Architectures
| render piechart by Count
content.title: Architectures {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where isnotempty(host_info_osversion_s)
| project host_info_osversion_s, host_info_host_name_s
| project-rename Host_OS_Version = host_info_osversion_s, Hostname = host_info_host_name_s
| summarize arg_max(Host_OS_Version, *) by Hostname
| summarize Count=count() by Host_OS_Version
| render piechart by Count
content.title: OS Versions {_timetoken:value}

content.json: Please select a hostname in order to show the latest jamf.log files.

parameters.name: _hostnamelogparser
parameters.label: Hostname
parameters.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where input_host_hostname_s != ""
| project-keep input_host_hostname_s
| project-rename Hostname = input_host_hostname_s
| summarize by Hostname

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where header_event_name_s contains "PLAINTEXT_LOG_COLLECTION_EVENT"
    and host_info_host_name_s == "{_hostnamelogparser:value}"
    and parse_json(path_s)[0] == "/var/log/jamf.log"
| project texts_s, TimeGenerated
| project-rename JamfLogs = texts_s
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, JamfLogs
| mv-expand parse_json(JamfLogs)
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| limit 250
content.title: Jamf Pro Local Logs
content.noDataMessage: No matches found based on the hostname

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where event_metadata_product_s == "Threat Events Stream"
    and event_action_s == "Blocked"
| extend blocks = case(event_action_s == "Blocked", "Blocked", "True")
| summarize arg_max(event_action_s, *) by event_timestamp_t
| summarize Count = count() by blocks
content.title: Threats blocked by NTP {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where event_metadata_product_s == "Threat Events Stream"
| extend severity_ = tostring(event_severity_d)
| extend severity_ = case(event_severity_d == 2, "Very low", event_severity_d == 4, "Low", event_severity_d == 6, "Medium", event_severity_d == 8, "High", event_severity_d == 10, "Very High", "True")
| where isnotempty(severity_)
| summarize arg_max(severity_, *) by event_timestamp_t
| summarize count() by severity_, bin(TimeGenerated,{_timetoken:grain})
| render areachart
content.title: Network Events Detected (Count By Severity) {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where event_metadata_product_s == "Threat Events Stream"
    and event_device_userDeviceName_s <> ""
    and event_eventType_name_s <> ""
| summarize arg_max(event_device_userDeviceName_s, *) by event_timestamp_t
| summarize Event = count() by event_device_userDeviceName_s
| project-rename HostName = event_device_userDeviceName_s
| sort by Event desc
content.title: Most Active Endpoints (Total, last {_timetoken:value})

items.name: Query - Most Active Endoints with Alerts

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where event_metadata_product_s == "Threat Events Stream"
    and event_eventType_name_s <> ""
| summarize arg_max(event_eventType_description_s, *) by event_timestamp_t
| summarize Events = count() by event_eventType_description_s, bin(TimeGenerated, {_timetoken:grain})
| render areachart with(kind=stacked)
content.title: Network Events Detected (Count by Type, {_timetoken:value})

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where event_metadata_product_s == "Threat Events Stream"
    and event_eventType_name_s <> ""
| summarize arg_max(event_eventType_description_s, *) by event_timestamp_t
| summarize Events = count() by event_eventType_description_s
| render piechart
content.title: Event Types {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where event_metadata_product_s == "Threat Events Stream" 
    and event_eventType_name_s <> ""
| extend name_ = event_eventType_description_s
| summarize arg_max(event_destination_name_s, *) by event_timestamp_t
| summarize count() by event_destination_name_s, event_eventType_description_s
| project-rename
    Destination = event_destination_name_s,
    EventType = event_eventType_description_s,
    Count = count_
| sort by Count desc
| limit 10
content.title: Top 10 Blocked destinations {_timetoken:value}

content.query:
jamfprotect_CL
| where event_metadata_product_s == "Threat Events Stream" 
    and event_destination_ip_s <> ""
| extend name_ = event_eventType_description_s
| summarize arg_max(event_destination_ip_s, *) by event_timestamp_t
| summarize count() by event_destination_ip_s
| project-rename
    IP_Address = event_destination_ip_s,
    Count = count_
| sort by Count desc
| limit 10
content.title: Top 10 Blocked IPs {_timetoken:value}
